snippet: The Best Buy Company had better-than-expected holiday sales, setting off a gain of $2, or 16.4 percent, in its stock price, to $14.21 a share on Friday.
abstract: Best Buy Company reports better-than-expected holiday sales, setting off a gain of $2, or 16.4 percent, in its stock price, to $14.21 a share.
lead_paragraph: The Best Buy Company had better-than-expected holiday sales, setting off a gain of $2, or 16.4 percent, in its stock price, to $14.21 a share on Friday.

headline.main: Best Buy Shares Rally on Improved Holiday Sales
headline.print_headline: Best Buy Shares Rally on Improved Holiday Sales
